data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting & Financial Results
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 26th July, 2022 and pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that in the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on 9th August, 2022 through Video Conferencing/Any Other Audio Visual Means, the Board has adopted/approved the following:
1. Un-audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 along with Limited Review Report.
2. Statement of Deviation/Variation pursuant to Regulation 32 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 read with SEBI circular CIR/CFD/CMD1/162/2019 dated December 24, 2019.

and further as per Letter attached herewith.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 23 (9) Of The Securities Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 (The 'Listing Regulations') ForThe Half Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 23(9) of the Listing Regulations, please find the disclosure of Related Party Transactions in the format specified for the half year ended 31st March, 2022.Kindly take the same on your records.

data.caption: Submission Of Declaration On Audit Report/S With Unmodified Opinion  In Respect   Of Consolidated And Standalone Audited Financial Results Submitted For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
Please note that further to our submission of Consolidated and Standalone Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 on 30th May, 2022 and with reference to your mail dated 7th June, 2022 in respect of subject matter, we would like to submit Declaration on Audit Report/s with unmodified opinion in respect of Consolidated and Standalone Audited Financial Results submitted for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022.

The same is enclosed herewith which forms part of Consolidated and Standalone Audited Financial Results submitted for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022.

Please take the above on your records.

data.caption: Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 23rd May, 2022 and pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on Monday, 30th May, 2022 through Video Conferencing, the Board has adopted/approved the following:

We enclose herewith the following:

1. Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results along with Auditors Report submitted by the Auditors in the required format for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022.

The above documents are enclosed herewith for your record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12.11.2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that in the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on 12th November, 2021, the Board has adopted the Consolidated and Standalone Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 along with Limited Review Report for the same.

The Consolidated and Standalone Un-Audited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report are enclosed herewith in the required format

The meeting commenced at 06:30 p.m. and concluded at 7.10 p.m.

Please take the same on your record.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on Saturday, 14th August, 2021 through Video Conferencing, the Board has transacted/approved the following:

1. Adoption of Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2021 along with Limited Review Report for the same. The Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results alongwith Limited Review Report are enclosed herewith in required format.

2. The Annual General Meeting of the Company will be held on Friday, 17th September, 2021 at 5.30 p.m. through Video Conferencing/Other Audio Visual Means.

3. Re-appointment of Mr. Harish Shetty (DIN-07144684), who retires from the office of Director, being eligible, offers himself for re-appointment & as detailed in attached Letter.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 14Th August, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on Saturday, 14th August, 2021 through Video Conferencing, the Board has transacted/approved the following:

1. Adoption of Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2021 along with Limited Review Report for the same. The Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results alongwith Limited Review Report are enclosed herewith in required format.

2. The Annual General Meeting of the Company will be held on Friday, 17th September, 2021 at 5.30 p.m. through Video Conferencing/Other Audio Visual Means.

3. Re-appointment of Mr. Harish Shetty (DIN-07144684), who retires from the office of Director, being eligible, offers himself for re-appointment. & as detailed in Letter

data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on Wednesday, 30th June, 2021 through Video Conferencing, the Board has adopted the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 along with Auditors Report for the same.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31St December, 2020
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that in the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on 12th February, 2021 through Video Conferencing, the Board has adopted the following

1. Noting of Circular Resolution passed on 12th February, 2021 for appointment of Mr. Jinesh Shah (DIN-08847375) as Additional Director (Non Executive, Independent) of the Company.
2. Noting of Circular Resolution passed on 12th February, 2021 for appointment of Mr. Prakash Waghela (DIN-06634166) as Additional Director (Non Executive, Independent) of the Company.
3. Noting of Circular Resolution passed on 12th February, 2021 for Reconstitution of Audit Committee on account of change in constitution of Board of Directors of the Company.
4. Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December, 2020 along with Limited Review Report for the same.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 12Th February, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that in the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on 12th February, 2021, the Board has adopted the following

1. Noting of Circular Resolution passed on 12th February, 2021 for appointment of Mr. Jinesh Shah (DIN-08847375) as Additional Director (Non Executive, Independent) of the Company.
2. Noting of Circular Resolution passed on 12th February, 2021 for appointment of Mr. Prakash Waghela (DIN-06634166) as Additional Director (Non Executive, Independent) of the Company.
3. Noting of Circular Resolution passed on 12th February, 2021 for Reconstitution of Audit Committee on account of change in constitution of Board of Directors of the Company.
4. Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December, 2020 along with Limited Review Report for the same.
